name: III. “MUNDUM IMPERARE TUUM”. Adultus (perfectum). SPECIAL EDITION.
description:
SPECIAL BONUS HOLOGRAM EDITION from the “Renaissance” genesis collection.
It’s a collection that emerges from past eras to reconnect us with our nature as human beings and remind us four of the stages of our development.

Description of the piece:
The third art piece represents the entry of the individual into adulthood. His upbringing is complete. With the sea and spirit calmer, the vision and discernment become sharper. Having a clearer observation, his worldview solidifies. Death begins to haunt. He is in the fullness of his faculties. He knows his existence better and can guide the tide and his surroundings at will, but he still has a lot to learn.
The artwork represents Poseidon traveling the depths of the ocean mounted on a stingray, avoiding the death that stalks him, escorted by a shoal.

MP4 - 1080 ×1560px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/renaissance
